article.Heading: Railway Budget 2016-17: See Rs 3k cr savings in FY17; to redevelop 400 stations via PPP
article.Summary: Effective inventory management helped save Rs 64 crore this year, Railway Minister Prabhu said. The Railways plans to redevelop 400 stations via the public private partnership (PPP), Prabhu said
article.Body:
Indian Railways plans to set up a new fund for financing projects, Railway Minister Suresh Prabhu said in his Budget speech. His department hopes to achieve annualised savings of Rs 3000 crore in the coming fiscal, he says.

Effective inventory management helped save Rs 64 crore this year, he says. The Railways plans to redevelop 400 stations via the public private partnership (PPP), Prabhu says.

The Railways plans to introduce Utkrisht double-decker Yatri Express, which will increase passenger capacity by 40 percent. Also on the anvil is Antyodaya Express, a superfast train for long routes.
